QuestData.Title: Delicate Negotiations
QuestData.Description: There is but one way to win the trust and loyalty of the Magram.$b$bIt must be beaten out of them.$b$bThey have suffered many losses in their war against my clan. They now possess an unfamiliar land, where they struggle just to feed themselves.$b$bNow is the time to strike.$b$bSpeak to me when you are ready, then ride in and plant my spear in the Fatherstone. If we can kill enough of them, their Khan will submit to our will.
QuestData.LogDescription: Khan Leh'prah wants you to place the Spear of the Kolkar Khan in the Fatherstone and defend it from the Magram until Khan Kammah appears.$b$bSpeak to Khan Leh'prah when you are ready to ride to the battle site.
QuestData.RewardText: Why is it that you meddle in centaur affairs, $r?
